pageTitle: Santa Cruz Bicycles Tallboy 2 Carbon XX1 ENVE - Complete Mountain Bike | Competitive Cyclist
title: Tallboy 2 Carbon
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {36547=I've got a Tallboy 2 with this exact setup (well, apart from changing the front-rotor to 180mm). The frame seems to climb better with less bobbing than the already great Tallboy I had before - combination of the CTD shock and the updated frame design. The XX1 drive-train is great and the XTR brakes are reported to be the best in breed, and were way better than the SRAM XX brakes I had in 2012 (magnesium ones). Expensive, but dream bike spec. Love it, and selling my hardtail as a result.}
